title: Just what you're looking for! 3 Bed / 2 Bath. Dayton Meadows Apartments
posting_body: ['Dayton Meadows Apartments', 'show contact info', 'Unit Details:', '3-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Footage:', '1092 sq ft |', 'Rental Rates:', '$1725/Month!', 'Lease Length:', '12-Month', 'Apartment Features:', '✓ Air Conditioning/Heating', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '✓ LED Lighting', '✓ Patio/Balcony', '✓ Vaulted Ceiling', '✓ Views', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', 'About Our Community:', 'Step outside and breathe in the fresh air as you spend a sunny afternoon soaking up the sun in our swimming pool.', 'Grab your athletic shoes and take advantage of our fitness center.', 'Spend some time relaxing in our community clubhouse.', "Whatever you choose to do, you'll love living here at Dayton Meadows.", 'Connect with us today to learn more about our community, and schedule a tour to see us in person!', 'Wonderful Amenities:', '✓ 24 hr Emergency Maintenance', '✓ Accepts Credit Cards', '✓ Affordable Housing', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ Playground', '✓ Section 8 Vouchers Accepted', '✓ Smoke Free', '✓ Mature Landscaping with Lush Foliage', '✓ Online Payments', '✓ Open Field Recreation Area', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Self-Guided Tours', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '1749 S Dayton St', 'Denver, CO 80247', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Pet Policy:', 'Dayton Meadows Apartments is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household with a 25 pound per pet weight limit.', '$35/pet rent per month.', '$200.00 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'F331C80C9BEB479']
